item.title: LLM Teacher-Student Framework for Text Classification With No Manually Annotated Data: A Case Study in IPTC News Topic Classification
item.description: Researchers developed a multilingual news topic classifier using a teacher-student framework and GPT-40 for automatic data annotation, achieving high performance without manual annotation.
